items.name: Rallia Dam – Go Trekking
items.description: Located on the Kotagiri road, Rallia Dam is a perfect place for trekkers and undoubtedly one of Coonoor's best places. Nestled away from the hustle and bustle of the city, the pathway to the dam offers a beautiful trek through the forest. Much famed for its enthralling environs, the Rallia Dam is quite popular among tourists for its serene atmosphere.
items.location_hint: Kotagiri Road | Near Banthomai Village, Coonoor, India

items.name: Dolphin’s Nose – Jaw-Dropping Views
items.location_hint: 10 km from Coonoor Centre, Coonoor 643101, India

items.name: Lady Canning’s Seat – Picturesque Views
items.description: Surrounded by a vast stretch of land and tea plantations, Lady Canning's seat is an attractive mansion in the heart of the town. Treating travellers to splendid views of the Nilgiris, it is one of the most beautiful places to visit in Coonoor.
items.location_hint: 9 km from Coonoor, Tamil Nadu, India

items.name: Highfield Tea Factory – Soak The Views
items.location_hint: Attadi, Tamil Nadu

items.name: Lamb’s Rock – Thrill At Its Best
items.description: Coonoor attractions are plenty, but nothing can match this spellbinding spot. Lamb's Rock is a viewpoint in Coonoor that offers captivating views of the hill station. The viewpoint is located at a height, and one has to trek to reach the spot. While going towards the viewpoint, you will find scintillating tea plantations on your route, a beautiful sight to behold! Once you reach the point, you will be left amazed by the beauty of the surroundings. It is one of the most beautiful places to see in Coonoor, and you must visit it!
items.location_hint: Burliyar, Tamil Nadu 643103

items.name: Ketti Valley – Views Like None Other
items.location_hint: Nagapattinam – Coimbatore – Gundlupet Hwy, Elk Hill, Thalayathimund, Tamil Nadu 643002

items.name: Hidden Valley – Unravel The Charm
items.description: Hidden Valley is a hidden gem in Coonoor that offers picturesque views that will give you another reason to explore the hill station. It is one of the most exciting places to visit in Coonoor. The valley is perched on the outskirts of Coonoor, which makes it a good place for a weekend getaway. The valley offers experiences like mountaineering, rock climbing, trekking, and more.
items.location_hint: 168K2 Rolston Club Road, Udhagamandalam, Tamil Nadu 643001
